statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -4 \\ 6 \\ 2 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -8 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ 8 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
